sentences.sContent: He devoted a major section of his massive report to an analysis of U.S. aircraft design.
sentences.sCn: 他在那份厚重的报告中用一个主要章节分析了美国的飞机设计。

words.tran: 虔诚的，祷告的；信仰的；献身的
献身于…；致力于…（devote的过去分词）

remMethod.val: de ＋ vote(发誓) → 拼命发誓 → 将…奉献给

trans.tranOther: to use all or most of your time, effort etc in order to do something or help someone
